original_title: 舞台 版 イナズマ イレブン
overview: A Live Action Performance was done based on the first part of the anime up until Raimon beat Teikoku for the first time.  The plot of the Live Action Performance follows how the match of Raimon and Teikoku Gakuen ended. It also shows the hissatsu techniques.
title: Inazuma Eleven: Live Action
